programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Geraldine has a test-run of being a parent by looking after Violet for a day. Poh Choo tries to convince Rose and Evelyn to give in to Nooraini but it backfires.

programme.title: The Good Doctor S4
programme.desc: Morgan and Shaun's pregnant patient with twins has pain, forcing the doctors to grapple with a decision no one wants to make. Shaun asks Lea to move back in despite her reservations.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S16
programme.desc: America's Got Talent returns with fresh new faces and familiar favorites, along with the excitement, thrills and feel-good performances. programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S39
programme.desc: (Encore) Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: Planet Action S2
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Open Homes S5
programme.desc: We kick off the show in Brisbane checking out a trendy new hotspot and home, We get kitchen and recipe tips from Adam, and at the climax we see a coastal home on the sunshine coast.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Rise (S4)
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Legendary Blader Valt Aoi has been training the next generation of elite Bladers at Spain's BC Sol. One day, rookie Bladers Dante Koryu and Delta Zakuro witness Valt unleashing his newly evolved Gamma Bey, Sword Valtryek. To their surprise, Valtryek radiates a golden light as it rockets around the stadium. Inspired by the limitless possibilities of this "Hyper-Flux" state, both Dante and Delta seek the same bond with their Beys.

programme.desc: 外酥内软的印度煎饼、香醇清甜的米酒、鲜美多汁的鸭肉、香气诱人的麻油，还有现做现吃的马苏里拉乳酪，这些都是生产者倾注心血所生产出来的好食材。让主持人王禄江和林有懿带你深入了解这些食材的生产过程.

programme.title: SHERO
programme.desc: 张尹晨与张尹夕是对感情深厚的姐妹。妹妹尹夕自从父母7年前被杀害后，便开了一间女保镖公司SHERO。在有史以来危险指数最高的任务中，尹夕与旗下女保镖保护来新的韩国著名球星金东炫，遇到黑帮袭击.
